faqs.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum has 10% Vitamin C and key ingredients Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid. It focuses on benefits such as Brightening, Fades dark spots.
